org.switchyard.component.resteasy.composer

Class RESTEasyBindingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.resteasy.composer.RESTEasyBindingData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingData, SecurityBindingData

    public class RESTEasyBindingData
extends Object
implements SecurityBindingData
    Wrapper for RESTEasy messages.
    Author:
    Magesh Kumar B © 2012 Red Hat Inc.
